content_blocks.title: MITRE ATT&CK Mapping

content.text: This attack uses the following MITRE ATT&CK techniques: Reconnaissance: T1589, T1591, Initial Access: T1566, T1189, T1091, Execution: T1204, Command and Control: T1071

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: MITRE ATT&CK provides a common language for describing adversary behavior.
memory_aids: 🎯 MITRE ATT&CK = Adversary tactics and techniques
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Security teams use ATT&CK to map detections and prioritize defenses.

post_assessment.question: What differentiates APT28 from APT29?
options: APT28 is more aggressive and destructive

post_assessment.question: Which APT28 malware family is notable?
post_assessment.explanation: X-Agent (Sofacy) is APT28's primary modular backdoor with extensive capabilities.
